scripts.deploy-dev: npm run zip && aws configure set default.region us-east-2 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name testing-an-already-existing --zip-file fileb://../Archive.zip
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run zip && aws configure set default.region us-east-1 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name testing-an-already-existing  --zip-file fileb://../Archive.zip
